title: Discribe Your Play Style/Tips!
body:
Heyhey!

So I've not played league of legends since early 2015.

What would you say, to someone that will be coming back in the coming months, of what I've missed out on, what I need to know, etc etc.

This should be interesting! Thanks guys!

replies.body: Boot up the youTube and look up Sky William's, erm, 'Playing like a b*$ch' series. Three videos. He's a comedian who's a gay, black man (a fact he thrashes a fair bit) but its hella funny and informative. The mentality fits the meta perfectly right now. Big plays just aren't quite rewarded so well currently unless its match ending late, late game play.

I used to love watching Sky's streams and videos! Thanks for the reminder!

Will do, appreciate the tips! :)
Read patches 5.22, 6.9 and then 6.10 - should put you reasonably up to date.
